pkgmetadata.longdescription: Endogenous Perturbation Analysis of Cancer // Estimates sparse matrices A or G using fast lasso regression from mRNA transcript levels Y and CNA profiles U. Two models are provided, EPoC A where AY + U + R = 0 and EPoC G where Y = GU + E, the matrices R and E are so far treated as noise. For details see the manual page of 'lassoshooting' and the article Rebecka Jrnsten, Tobias Abenius, Teresia Kling, Linna Schmidt, Erik Johansson, Torbjrn E M Nordling, Bodil Nordlander, Chris Sander, Peter Gennemark, Keiko Funa, Bjrn Nilsson, Linda Lindahl, Sven Nelander (2011) doi:10.1038/msb.2011.17.
